### defineSymbol() {#a2f758971f2c678319b2789af1377ef11}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void WinCOFFWriter::defineSymbol (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcassembler">MCAssembler</a> &amp; Asm, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &amp; Symbol)</>}>
This function takes a symbol data object from the assembler and creates the associated <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/coff">COFF</a> symbol staging object.
